name: Quick Reposition

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Reposition, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: On your turn, you can perform a single reposition combat maneuver (Advanced Players Guide 320) in place of one of your melee attacks. You must choose the melee attack with the highest base attack bonus to make the reposition.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: A reposition combat maneuver is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: Your opponent becomes an unwitting dance partner, following your lead while you fight.
